meanings.definition: To agree or consent to a request or demand.
meanings.sent1: She accedes to her friend's request to join the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The board finally accedes to the shareholders' demands for transparency.
meanings.sent3: The cat accedes to the dog's plea for a truce by sharing its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: After much deliberation, the jury accedes to the overwhelming evidence presented.
meanings.sent5: The teacher accedes to the students' petition for a longer recess.

meanings.definition: To assume an office or position.
meanings.sent1: He accedes to the role of team captain with pride.
meanings.sent2: The newly elected president will accede to office next week.
meanings.sent3: The robot accedes to the position of chief engineer in the futuristic company.
meanings.sent4: The crown prince will accede to the throne upon his father's retirement.
meanings.sent5: She accedes to the prestigious title of head chef at the renowned restaurant.
